title.rendered: FREE $10 Gift Card + Cool Gifts + Sulli Giles

content.rendered:
Receive a $10 gift card FREE with every $25 gift card you buy!

Get a FREE $10 gift card with every $25 gift card bought! This offer is good from November 27 through December 24. Both the $10 and $25 gift cards must be redeemed after 12/25.

Find the Perfect Christmas Gift

Looking for the perfect gift? We carry new AND used books! We can special order just about any title, be it out of print, used, or new. Plus, our prices compete with competitors… including Amazon.com! There is just no reason to buy from anywhere else.

We also have some other fun gifts for the book lover this year!

Sulli Giles Book Signing

Sulli Giles was raised on the muddy banks of the Ocmulgee River in Middle Georgia with her younger sister and parents. She began working on Caught in the 6th grade and finished it the end of her sophomore year. Sulli enjoys playing soccer, writing, and reading. She finds little joy in math, math related sciences, and people who end sentences in ‘at.’ Join us at the Macon location (Riverside Dr.) on Saturday, Dec. 5, 11 a.m.-1 p.m. for her book signing!

Walls of Books D.C.

We’re packing up for D.C. Stay tuned for more updates. That store will be opening soon!
